76D27010DFE70131C01F68A86D17958E.description: Encourage others to make positive health choices.

76D23320DFE70131C01E68A86D17958E.description: Make requests to promote personal health.

76D1E500DFE70131C01D68A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to advocate for personal, family and community health.
comments: Advocacy skills help students promote healthy norms and healthy behaviors. This standard helps students develop important skills to target their health-enhancing messages and to encourage others to adopt healthy behaviors.

76D19C80DFE70131C01C68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate behaviors that avoid or reduce health risks.

76D14E30DFE70131C01B68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate healthy practices and behaviors to maintain or improve personal health.

76D0EF30DFE70131C01A68A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to practice health-enhancing behaviors and avoid or reduce health risk.
comments: Research confirms that the practice of health-enhancing behaviors can contribute to a positive quality of life. In addition, many diseases and injuries can be prevented by reducing harmful and risk-taking behaviors. This standard promotes the acceptance of personal responsibility for health and encourages the practice of healthy behaviors.

76D0B290DFE70131C01968A86D17958E.description: Identify who can help when assistance is needed to achieve a personal health goal.

76D07680DFE70131C01868A86D17958E.description: Identify a short-term personal health goal and take action toward achieving the goal.

76D03890DFE70131C01768A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to use goal-setting skills to enhance health.
comments: Goal-setting skills are essential to help students identify, adopt, and maintain healthy behaviors. This standard includes the critical steps that are needed to achieve both short-term and long-term health goals. These skills make it possible for individuals to have aspirations and plans for the future.

76CFFB60DFE70131C01668A86D17958E.description: Describe potential consequences of health-related decisions.

76CFBB00DFE70131C01568A86D17958E.description: Differentiate between situations when a health-related decision can be made independently or when assistance is needed.

76CF73E0DFE70131C01468A86D17958E.description: Identify situations when a health-related decision is needed.

76CEFD40DFE70131C01368A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to use decision-making skills to enhance health.
comments: Decision-making skills are needed to identify, implement, and sustain health-enhancing behaviors. This standard includes the essential steps that are needed to make healthy decisions as prescribed in the performance indicators. When applied to health issues, the decision-making process enables individuals to collaborate with others to improve their quality of life.

76CEA230DFE70131C01268A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate ways to tell a trusted adult if threatening or harmful behaviors affect self or others.

76CE6120DFE70131C01168A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate ways to respond to an unwanted, threatening, or dangerous situation.

76CE21A0DFE70131C01068A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate listening skills to enhance health.

76CDE170DFE70131C00F68A86D17958E.description: Demonstrate healthy ways to express needs, wants, and feelings.

76CD9550DFE70131C00E68A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to use interpersonal communication skills to enhance health and avoid or reduce health risk.
comments: Effective communication enhances personal, family and community health. This standard focuses on how responsible individuals use verbal and nonverbal skills to develop and maintain healthy personal relationships. The ability to organize and convey information and feelings is the basis for strengthening interpersonal interactions and reducing or avoiding conflict.

76CD5070DFE70131C00D68A86D17958E.description: Explain the type of help provided by school and community health helpers.

76CD12E0DFE70131C00C68A86D17958E.description: Identify ways to locate school and community health helpers.

76CCD4C0DFE70131C00B68A86D17958E.description: Identify trusted adults and professionals who can help promote health.

76CC9410DFE70131C00A68A86D17958E.description: Students will demonstrate the ability to access valid information and products and services to enhance health.
comments: Access to valid health information and health-promoting products and services is critical in the prevention, early detection, and treatment of health problems. This standard focuses on how to identify and access valid health resources and how to reject unproven sources. Application of the skills of analysis, comparison, and evaluation of health resources empowers students to achieve health literacy.

76CC5600DFE70131C00968A86D17958E.description: Describe how the media can influence health behaviors.

76CC1730DFE70131C00868A86D17958E.description: Identify what the school can do to support personal health practices and behaviors.

76CBD4D0DFE70131C00768A86D17958E.description: Identify how the family influences personal health practices and behaviors.

comments: Health is affected by a variety of positive and negative influences within society. This standard focuses on identifying and understanding the diverse internal and external factors that influence health practices and behaviors among youth, including personal values, beliefs, and perceived norms.
76CB7CB0DFE70131C00668A86D17958E.description: Students will analyze the influence of family, peers, culture, media, technology and other factors on health behaviors.

76CB4020DFE70131C00568A86D17958E.description: Describe why it is important to seek health care.

76CB0150DFE70131C00468A86D17958E.description: List ways to prevent common childhood injuries.

76CABB40DFE70131C00368A86D17958E.description: Describe ways to prevent communicable diseases.

76CA77D0DFE70131C00268A86D17958E.description: Identify the multiple dimensions of health.

76CA31E0DFE70131C00168A86D17958E.description: Identify that healthy behaviors affect personal health.

76C9D840DFE70131C00068A86D17958E.description: Students will comprehend concepts related to health promotion and disease prevention to enhance health.
comments: The acquisition of basic health concepts and functional health knowledge provides a foundation for promoting health-enhancing behaviors among youth. This standard includes essential concepts that are based on established health behavior theories and models. Concepts that focus on both health promotion and risk reduction are included in the performance indicators.
